item.description:
The Fenway Bark RSVP list was light (we need 8 frenchies to cover costs) and there were a few requests to move this weeks venue so, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at Peter's Park!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie... I will not be there to collect so please make a mental note of what you owe and hopefully you can pay at a later date or as soon as I set up a way to pay online.

Your frenchie's canine brothers, sisters and friends are more than welcome to join us at the park! Please abide by the weight/size limits posted at the entrance to the small and larger dog entrances.

Get your meetup on and come join the fun, there is plenty of metered parking right on Washington St next to the park!

Â 

Thanks so much, Zeek!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: **Change Of Venue** September French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
